house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1960 has 3 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) , 1 car garage. Rooms include master bedroom. Features include private pool, patio, storage space.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Eat In Kitchen, Garage Door Opener, Pantry,Ranch Style, Storage Space, Workshop
